header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME CLASSIC - CAMPUS GAME

articles.description: Gabe Levin and Temidayo Yussuf posted double-doubles and Long Beach State pulled away in the second half to defeat Cal Poly 73-54 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Levin, Yussuf power Long Beach State past Cal Poly 73-54

articles.description: With less than seven seconds left and tied at 94-94, Stephen Thompson Jr. drains the game-winning 3-pointer to lead the Beavers to victory in double-overtime against the Huskies.
articles.headline: Oregon State's Thompson sinks dagger on Washington at buzzer

images.caption: With less than seven seconds left and tied at 94-94, Stephen Thompson Jr. drains the game-winning 3-pointer to lead the Beavers to victory in double-overtime against the Huskies.
images.name: Oregon State's Thompson sinks dagger on Washington at buzzer

articles.description: Stephen Thompson Jr. hit a 3-pointer with 0.3 seconds left in double overtime as Oregon State stormed back to beat Washington 97-94 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Oregon State holds off Washington 97-94 in double OT

images.caption: With less than seven seconds left and tied at 94-94, Stephen Thompson Jr. drains the game-winning 3-pointer to lead the Beavers to victory in double-overtime against the Huskies.
images.name: Oregon State's Thompson sinks dagger on Washington at buzzer

articles.description: Kentucky has lost a third straight game for the first time in John Calipari's tenure and looks lost, while Texas A&M appears to have found its stride.
articles.headline: John Calipari won't panic, but Kentucky's slide is cause for concern

images.caption: "I'm not cracking," John Calipari said after Kentucky lost a third straight game for the first time in his tenure. "This doesn't faze me."
images.name: John Calipari [576x324]

articles.description: The Tigers score 45 points in the second half to put away the Rebels and grab their fifth SEC win.
articles.headline: LSU beats Ole Miss 82-66

images.caption: The Tigers score 45 points in the second half to put away the Rebels and grab their fifth SEC win.
images.name: LSU beats Ole Miss 82-66

articles.description: Rawle Alkins scored 20 points, Deandre Ayton added 18 and No. 13 Arizona expanded its Pac-12 lead with an 81-67 victory over Southern California on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Alkins, Ayton lead No. 13 Arizona past Trojans, 87-67

images.caption: After losing at home to UCLA on Thursday, Deandre Ayton records 18 points and seven rebounds in No. 13 Arizona's 81-67 win over USC.
images.name: Arizona bounces back against USC
